issue.title: [Packaging] Vendor r-arrow-feedstock conda-forge recipe
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9564](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9564). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Since we have r-arrow on conda-forge, we should exercise it similarly to arrow-cpp and pyarrow packages.

cc `[~uwe]` `[~npr]`

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9564?focusedCommentId=17165778) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Duplicate of ARROW-4960?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9564?focusedCommentId=17586025) by @toddfarmer:*
Transitioning issue from Resolved to Closed to based on resolution field value.
